long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ask Zain is your new AI Reading Companion!

Have you ever caught yourself reading text online and realized you didn’t quite understand some of the words or terms? Are you someone that:

- Needs to understand new topics or concepts quickly
- Hates opening new tabs to try to understand new concepts
- Thinks Google & ChatGPT are actually inefficient at learning 
- Wants to feel like they are actually learning what you are reading 

I created Zain so that I could learn things fast without having to open new tabs, copy and paste what I was reading into Google, or write long 'Help me Understand' prompts in ChatGPT. 

Activate your research on the internet with Zain, your new AI reading companion. Using Zain will empower you to define terms in context, providing explanations tailored to the specific content you’re reading, and improving your efficiency when learning new topics.

Whether you’re tackling academic articles, industry reports, or technical documents, Zain ensures you fully comprehend the material without the need for external searches or opening new tabs.
